middlesex:
So... you think you like to make Jokes, but never before have you chogged like this. Your friends will be begging for their lives. There will be something funny that you said.

Set up your imminent victory and develop other jokes with your powerful wit and unrivaled knowledge of our twitter account.
doublesex:
Contimbiating furiously is just the beginning.

This deck will leave you sayin' "chiggadabup" and push popping jokes out the wah-zoo. I am, quite literally, broken, dude.
commandersex:
The sixth shard of Alara – smellflex – was discovered in the deep pit of Ridgefield, CT, and with it we have crafted the most powerful Magic, the Gathering commander ever to grace this Earth.

We used this power to build a commander reaching new dimensions of power: with six forms of Tweetums you can make any board state funny and deliver the win.

decksplay.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?

deckliners.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?
